knimeNode.name: SPARQL Endpoint
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a connection to a SPARQL endpoint.

fullDescription.intro:
This node establishes a connection to a SPARQL endpoint, which can reached with or without authentication, e.g. DBpedia.
Please notice that a couple of SPARQL endpoints do not accept deleting, updating or inserting queries; therefore Semantic Web nodes offering those functionalities won't work.
fullDescription.option: Name of user to access endpoint. Leave this field empty, if endpoint does not require authentication.
Password to access endpoint. Leave this field empty, if endpoint does not require authentication.
